answers.answer: Have you had your blood sugar checked lately?

Untreated/undiagnosed diabetes symptoms can include withType one (onset childhood, usually undiagnosed until after age 20 (from US gov website):FatigueIncreased thirstIncreased urinationNauseaVomitingWeight loss in spite of increased appetiteWith Type two (adulthood onset):Blurred visionFatigueIncreased appetiteIncreased thirstIncreased urinationSo, please get your blood sugar checked!Also, any new type headache deserves a scan of the head to check for tumor.  If you have a pituitary tumor (they'd base ordering a scan on if you have one or more abnormal endocrine test), that takes an special MRI (dynamic w/and without contrast) to look for, not just a plain brain scan.

question: nausea, headaches, dizziness, blurred vision dry mouth(doesn matter how much i drink) and fatigue
title: how i feel
